text: wmthl aladhin yunfiqun 'amwalahum tlbana lrda allah waetqadana raskhana bisidq wedh, kamathal bstan eazim bard ealiat tayibatan hatalat ealayh 'amtar ghzyrt, ftdaeft thmrath, wa'iin lam tasqut ealayh al'amtar alghazirat fykfyh radhadh almatar lyety althmrt almdaeft, wkdhlk nafaqat almukhlasin tuqbl eind allah wtudaef, qllat 'am kthurt, fallah almuttalie ealaa alsrayr, albasir balzwahr walbwatn, ythyb kla bhsb 'ikhlash
